code: import*as actionTypes from"./actionTypes";export var openSidebar=function openSidebar(){return{type:actionTypes.OPEN_SIDEBAR};};export var drawOpen=function drawOpen(){return{type:actionTypes.DRAW_SIDEBAR_OPEN};};export var drawClose=function drawClose(){return{type:actionTypes.DRAW_SIDEBAR_CLOSE};};export var darkTheme=function darkTheme(open){return{type:actionTypes.DARK_THEME,darkTheme:open};};export var clearMessage=function clearMessage(){return{type:actionTypes.CLEAR_MESSAGE,success:null,error:null};};
